data.text: @The_5th_Turtle Fun fact... the nursing home he has to put his grandma in was in the same building complex as the end of Deadpool 2, filmed in good ol’ British Columbia.

Seeing how funny Adam Sandler was in this movie makes me wish he still actually tried. Overall Happy Gilmore is hysterical & it’s still arguably Adam Sandler’s best. I love it. Great funny movie. (2/2) https://t.co/BHUIbpAIRQ

I honestly don’t know what else I can say about this movie. Happy Gilmore is still freaking hilarious & definitely holds up. This is proof that Adam Sandler was actually funny & tried in his movies. It’s endlessly quotable & many memorable scenes. The cast is great as well. (1/2)
Hahahaha Abraham Lincoln Hahahaha it’s just so stupid, but hilarious Hahahaha https://t.co/ZGd4WKqDrq
God, I would not wanna be chased down by this man. That would be terrifying. https://t.co/PMfHjACPNC
If you didn’t read this in a high pitched girlish voice, you read it wrong https://t.co/fk8ISg1A5f
Hahahaha Hahahaha **pauses laughter & catches breath** Hahahaha Hahahaha https://t.co/125q99LUWJ

There’s got be one of these at every sporting event. https://t.co/eiJiwJIDbr
Funny scene showing the stack of giant checks in his car, but where do you even deposit those checks? Like a giant bank?
Why did Happy’s former boss Mr. Larson wait for so long to remove the nail from his head? How long after that incident happened does this movie take place?
I love everything about Kevin Nealon Hahahaha https://t.co/19zc7Crdak
Hahahaha Hahahaha the funniest celebration ever. https://t.co/B2t2jWW7Yy

God, this movie already has me laughing hard. This is proof that Adam was actually funny & tried at one point. https://t.co/5I2tD2WfO1

He might be a bad hockey player, but they saw his anger problems at tryouts. So why would be insult him? I’m not saying he was asking for it, but he definitely knew what would happen. https://t.co/kmhOhVFKOX
